allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: full app with WebSocket, async I/O, memoization, centralized config

Backend: Express + WebSocket \(ws\) server with compression, async file persistence
with 500ms debounce, leaderboard/results caching, ETag support on all GET routes,
and broadcast on every mutation.

Frontend: React app with centralized API config, WebSocket push replacing 5s polling,
React.memo on all components, useCallback/useMemo optimizations, and ErrorBoundary
for graceful error recovery.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-NetFirewallRule -Direction Inbound -Action Allow | Where-Object { $_DisplayName -match ''BIDMOD|node|react|3000|5000'' } | Format-List DisplayName,Enabled,Action,Direction")

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -File - <<'PSEOF'
Get-NetFirewallRule -Direction Inbound | Where-Object { $_.DisplayName -match 'BIDMOD|node|react|3000|5000' } | Format-List DisplayName,Enabled,Action
PSEOF)
Bash(netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="BIDMODPLOK Backend" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=5000)

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "Start-Process -FilePath ''netsh'' -ArgumentList ''advfirewall firewall add rule name=""BIDMODPLOK Backend"" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=5000'' -Verb RunAs -Wait")

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "Start-Process -FilePath ''netsh'' -ArgumentList ''advfirewall firewall add rule name=""BIDMODPLOK Frontend"" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=3000'' -Verb RunAs -Wait")
